title: New: Freddie Joachim – Waves
body:
Photo By [Shelbie Dimond](http://www.flickr.com/photos/theciscokid/)  
**Freddie Joachim’s** work often comes across as a musical stream of consciousness; it floats blissfully through time, appearing heavily improvised while delicately constructed. His new piece, _Waves_, does exactly what it says on the tin; it’s a glamorous jazz number that’s perfect for a summer’s day.

Stream it below.

 [Freddie Joachim – Waves](http://soundcloud.com/freddiejoachim/freddie-joachim-waves) by [freddiejoachim](http://soundcloud.com/freddiejoachim)
